title: XXL Hot Water Bottle with Cover Extra Large 3.5L - Pasper - Fluffy Soft Grey Cover - Pain Relief Period, Neck and Shoulder - for Babies, Children and Adults (Extra Long - 3.5 Liter)
features: EXTRA LARGE HOT WATER BOTTLE - XXL size of 3.5 liters, keeps you warm for 8 hours. Normal hot water bottles are 1.8 liters and cool down after 4 hours. Fill it in the evening, and the next morning, Pasper’s hot water bottle is still warm.
WITH COVER - Fluffy and soft cover ensures longed warmth and prevents burning upon direct contact with the skin. Cover is machine washable at 30 degrees.
LEAK-PROOF - Certified with the international standard for hot water bottles BS1970:2012.
ONE OF THE FIRST AND BIGGEST - Pasper has one of the first and biggest hot water bottles in Europe. Perfect as a gift for women, birthdays, or Christmas.
SAVE ON ENERGY COSTS - Filling the Pasper hot water bottle requires less heat than heating an entire room. By choosing Pasper, you can save on energy, gas, and money.
description: Product Description The Pasper Extra Large Hot Water Bottle Twice the size of a regular hot water bottle Discover the extra large hot water bottle from Pasper, designed to deliver twice the warmth and comfort! Certified according to British Standard BS1970:2012 Keeps you warm without worry to enjoy every cozy second. 8+ Hours of Warmth Our XXL hot water bottles are designed to stay warm longer! Why not? Feel the warmth! Designed for you! Pasper’s bottle meets all your needs. From Dream to Reality When Claudia was 18, she had a big idea, literally! She dreamed up a hot water bottle so large, it could keep you warm all day long. With this spark of innovation, Pasper created the perfect oversized hot water bottle. Five years later, Pasper’s hot water bottles are spreading warmth across the globe.

product_details_tab_data.Categories - Tree: Health & Personal Care › Medication & Treatments › Hot & Cold Therapies › Hot Water Bottles
product_details_tab_data.Safety Warning: Do not fill with boiling water and only fill up to a maximum of 2/3 of the contents. In times of not use, empty the water from the hot water bottle and remove the cap.
